ygData.subject: Re: Finally...
ygData.msgSnippet: the programmers know very well that the fireworks don t work, that s why they removed the book from the game bugging them about it will probably just result in
ygData.messageBody:
the programmers know very well that the fireworks don't work, that's why
they removed the book from the game
bugging them about it will probably just result in them removing the shaft
from the game because fixing the fireworks is at the VERY bottom of the to
do list, even lower than creating some kind of itch relieving cream for ogre
and troll butts

Fixer, gnomish enchanter, Cazic-Thule

> From: "Brian Nelson" <rock-on@...>
>
> Today I also made gnomish fireworks. I was a little pissed that they
> totally suck so I petitioned a GM. He went ahead and summoned the items to
> make fireworks and made some. The reply I got from him after he tried them
> out was "That totally sucked! I shall see to it that the game developers
get
> a nice little letter concearning gnomish fireworks". So I hope this helps.
I
> think that all of you should petition in game about the firewors sucking.
> Maybe they will feel sorry for us little old gnomes and decide to make the
> fireworks look better. The more petitions they get, the better the chances
> of that happening. I'm crossing my fingers.
>
> Brillian Novaspire
> 29th Wizard
> Solusek Ro
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
